title: 15 Minute Guided Breathwork To Help Release Stuck Energy & Emotions
description:
15 Minute activating breathwork routine to help clear any emotional blockages and bring you into a state of relaxation and clarity. 

Want longer videos? Come join us on Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/breathewithsandy
Website & Newsletter
https://breathewithsandy.com/
Subscribe for more content like this:
https://www.youtube.com/c/breathewithsandy
If you want to share some love and create good Karma you can buy me some coffee below. 
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/BreatheWsandy
Find me on instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/breathewithsandy/

By engaging in longer and more intense sessions, breathers may access a deeper and more immersive state of self-discovery. This experience can lead to a greater level of insight, the emergence of new and enlightening thoughts, heightened awareness of one's emotional state, and improved clarity. If you are interested in diving further into your own being, longer sessions are available on my Patreon channel. https://www.patreon.com/breathewithsandy

I personally make all aspects of creating this content, including the music, guided voice, and video editing. It brings me pleasure to create content that can benefit you, and my hope is that it can help you improve your life in various ways, such as fostering self-love and kindness, reducing stress and anxiety, decreasing inflammation, and increasing energy. Whatever improvements it may bring, I encourage you to take a moment to appreciate yourself for investing time in your personal growth.

Safety Disclaimer:
All information provided by this channel is only for educational and entertainment purposes.  Breathe With Sandy LLC is not responsible for any losses, liabilities, injuries or damages resulting from any and all claims as a result of the information or advice given in these videos. . If you partake in this breathing session, you agree that you do so at your own risk, are voluntarily participating in these sessions, assume all risk of injury to yourself.
Do not practice this breathwork during pregnancy, or if you are epileptic. People with cardiovascular issues, or any other serious health conditions, should always consult a medical professional before starting breathwork. These breathing exercises are a guide only, you should always listen to your own body and not push yourself, if you feel unwell stop. Never practice breathing exercises before or during diving, driving, swimming, taking a bath, or in any other circumstance where the loss of consciousness could result in physical injury. These breathing techniques  may cause tingling sensations, a ringing in the ears, and/or dizziness in the head. If you feel any of these responses, don't panic it is completely normal. 
#spirituality    #energyhealing   #breathwork 
00:00 Intro 
04:00 Round 1
08:20 Round 2
12:45 Round 3
17:00 Meditation
channelDescription:
Sharing the power of the breath with weekly guided exercises 
 

From world traveler to breathwork facilitator and content creator, I'm here putting a 21st century spin on ancient breathing techniques infused with rhythmic music that I produce myself. So the music, video editing, voice over and all else is done by me, with a heart intention behind it all.  I greatly appreciate all of the support helping me continue to improve. 

I create these videos and music with love, aiming to uplift and bring positivity. Longer sessions offer a variety of benefits, including heart opening,manifestation, dissolving of the ego and self limiting beliefs, releasing trauma, and accessing altered states of consciousness. For an enhanced experience, I recommend wearing headphones.

If you want to deepen your practice and receive longer breathwork videos + Meditations you can join our Patreon community:
https://www.patreon.com/breathewithsandy

Much love,
Sandy

comments:
READ FIRST:
For activating sessions like this, it is always recommended to lay down in a safe and comfortable environment. The intention behind all of these breathwork experiences that I create is to facilitate the experience of deep states of gratitude. Sometimes, we need to clear the clutter in the mind and body to make space for these elevated emotions like joy and gratitude. Thats where these activating sessions can help.

If, during any breathwork session, you feel emotions coming to the surface, allow yourself to fully experience and feel all of them—the lows and the highs. This process moves you out of suppression and depression and into gratitude and expression.

Much love to all,
Sandy

I did this exercise believing I was going to release some negative emotions, my intention was to get rid of something painful... Can you believe the stuck emotion in me was GRATITUDE?! I'm in tears right now, the most grateful, most beautiful cry I have ever experienced! I am so grateful for my Higher Power and all the beings on my journey who have helped me CURE my addiction, I am forever grateful for my experience on earth, the love I feel within me is unlike anything I have ever experienced! I felt like I was going to start speaking another language, I am not even kidding you, some language I somehow knew was to communicate with God and the higher realms, oh my gosh, so much gratitude.... I've been doing breathwork everyday for just a couple weeks and it's something I will continue doing the rest of my life. You mean to tell me all I had to do was replace my drug use with meditation, prayer and breath work? Thank you for all the hard work you and your team have put into this channel and your dreams, it's inspiring me to do the same! ❤
I had to also add that it felt like my feet, head and hands were larger than my body and my chakras, they felt lit up, It felt like I was floating... What the heck just happened, lol, I love my Recovery journey!
For anyone reading this, find what activates you, stop focusing on what triggers you and instead focus on how you can activate your sense of wellbeing and wholeness, it does exist and it is waiting for you!
I no longer feel myself if I don’t start and end the day breathing with Sandy. You have perfected the instructional video format and you bring so much peace to the world. Thank you 🙏

After one round, I was energised. After 2-4 minutes, I lay down and was listening to Rumi and started crying because of hurt to my heart that family had caused. That was the first time in over a decade that i had cried. I felt such a release of tension and felt more loving to myself and others.

Now i understand why they call this type of breathing psychedelic, by half of the breath work i went into straight psychedelic mode, i felt a tingling sensation all over my body and could feel my brain and every cell in my body being oxygenated and regenerated with every breath, once i finished i just felt this tremendous harmony and peace in and out. Thank You very very much. God bless 🙏
